NAME: Name
DESCRIPTION: Titles, identifying phrases, or names given to an archaeological space.

NAME: Country
DESCRIPTION: A type of "nationality" field, though not in adjectival form; country refers to the modern name of the nation state in which the project is located

NAME: Region
DESCRIPTION: Geographic area where the project is located (modern)

NAME: Modern Name
DESCRIPTION: The modern toponym of the geographic location of the project

NAME: Location-Identifier
DESCRIPTION: Systematically assigned alphanumeric code identifying project location, if applicable

NAME: Location-Identifier Scheme
DESCRIPTION: Scheme used to generate identification code in Location-Identifier field, if applicable

NAME: Geolocation
DESCRIPTION: Coordinate pair(s) (latitude and longitude) that establishes a general location of project. Formatting: Latitude, Longitude for example: 41.255678,13.435335

NAME: Elevation
DESCRIPTION: Highest and lowest recorded altitudes of the project location, expressed as a range in meters according to the WGS 84 system.

NAME: Earliest Date
DESCRIPTION: Earliest date associated with project activity, expressed in yyyy/mm/dd format

NAME: Latest Date
DESCRIPTION: Latest date associated with project activity, expressed in yyyy/mm/dd format

NAME: Records Archive
DESCRIPTION: Location(s) of project documentation and records. Uniform name of the physical repository with full address.

NAME: Persistent Name
DESCRIPTION: Name by which the location of the project is traditionally known.

NAME: Complex Title
DESCRIPTION: The name of the complex of which the project is a part, if applicable.

NAME: Terminus Ante Quem
DESCRIPTION: Date at which the project location begins to exhibit evidence of human activity.

NAME: Terminus Post Quem
DESCRIPTION: Date at which the project location ceases to exhibit evidence of human activity.

NAME: Period
DESCRIPTION: Term that identifies the named, defined period(s) whose characteristics are represented in the project location.

NAME: Archaeological Culture
DESCRIPTION: Recognizable and recurring assemblage of artifacts from a specific time and place. Thought to constitute the material remains of a particular past human society or group

NAME: Description
DESCRIPTION: Concise narrative outlining the project

NAME: Brief Description
DESCRIPTION: 2 sentence narrative describing the project. Will appear on the home page of the public site.

NAME: Permitting Heritage
DESCRIPTION: Name of the heritage body granting permission for project
